forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 74. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the dawn unfolds with a graceful clarity, draping the skyline in a soft yet luminous embrace. The sun rises confidently, casting a golden glow over the bustling streets below and illuminating the iconic structures of the city, ensuring that today will be marked by sunshine and comfortable warmth. With temperatures expected to hover around 74 degrees, the atmosphere buzzes with potential, allowing both pedestrians and cyclists to revel in the mild, gentle breeze. The west-southwest wind sweeps through, adding an invigorating touch that stirs the leaves and beckons one to step outside. 

As the day progresses, the forecast promises an unbroken expanse of blue sky, with only fleeting whispers of clouds, an invitation for all to engage in the simple pleasures the city has to offer. Consider donning a light sweater in the morning, as the cooler moments will give way to a comfortable warmth by midday. Perhaps a stroll along the waterfront would be soothing—an opportunity to absorb the vibrant energy of the crowd while savoring a freshly brewed coffee. Or, if intrigue strikes, you might venture into one of the local galleries or quaint shops, each filled with stories waiting to be discovered. As night approaches, the stars will emerge amidst the clearing skies, inviting outdoor gathering with friends as the temperature dips serenely to 58 degrees, completing this beautiful tapestry of a day in San Francisco.
